page.title: 15HOUSES IN FIXBY / SHEEPRIDGE
page.content:
The houses in Fixby are old. Some of them have lawns in the front. Fixby houses are much better than the ones in Sheepridge. We walked all the way to count the houses and look at the street life. The houses are much different than ours. Some of them are 1, 2, 3 storey houses. Most of them are old detached and old semi-detached, new detached and new semi-detached. Our's are just normal. The houses are much more cared for. Not like ours. Ours are vandalised.
When we were walking down Lightridge Road we saw a house that had flower boxes outside the windows. Seven of the houses had special names. Five of the houses were for sale (between Â£56,OOO AND Â£7O,OOO).
CONTINUE PAGE 16
